sentences.sContent: It has many of the same nutrients of the rubicund liquid we love to consume (iron, protein, electrolytes, and caffeine) and has a delectable fruit punch flavor.
sentences.sContent_eng: It has many of the same nutrients of the rubicund liquid we love to consume (iron, protein, electrolytes, and caffeine) and has a delectable fruit punch flavor.
sentences.sCn: 这种红色液体不仅含有我们喜欢享用的营养素（如铁、蛋白质、电解质和咖啡因），还具有一种怡人的水果鸡尾酒风味。

sentences.sContent: His eyes were blue, his complexion rubicund , his figure almost portly and well-built, his body muscular, and his physical powers fully developed by the exercises of his younger days.
sentences.sContent_eng: His eyes were blue, his complexion rubicund , his figure almost portly and well-built, his body muscular, and his physical powers fully developed by the exercises of his younger days.
sentences.sCn: 蓝色的眼睛，红润的脸色，健壮的身材满是肌肉，充沛的体力完全是年轻时锻炼出来的。

trans.tranCn: (脸色, 肤色等)红润的, 透红的
trans.tranOther: of a reddish colour; ruddy; rosy
